description:
Hyuuga is the Mental Model of the Battleship http://anidb.net/ch61643 [Hyuuga], originally the flagship of the First Oriental Fleet of the http://anidb.net/ch56444 [Fleet of Fog]. She later became a part of http://anidb.net/ch56445 [Blue Steel].
Source: Aoki Hagane no Arpeggio Wiki
name: Hyuuga
